column24: Ability
All of your stacks are Glitch-free.
column25: UPLIFT FUTURE: Req = Robots not Emancipated, Human at a promoted Bernal & spend 20 Aqua. Effects = Every Robot becomes Emancipated, Casus belli for War, 12 VP.

column24: May perform the faction privileges on both sides of your Crew card.
column25: PAN SAPIENS FUTURE: Req = Have 3 Factories connected to Space Elevators. Effect = Casus belli for War. (Endgame) +2 VP for each glory chit owned.

column24: All your Humans can commit Felonies, even if defending Humans are present.
column25: SECESSION FUTURE: Req = 2 Promoted Human Colonists at an Anchored Bernal with Dirtside 5+. Effects = Casus belli for War, 10 VP.

column24: Acts as a Freighter when building a Space Elevator.
column25: BEANSTALK FUTURE: Req = Have 3+ Space Elevators built by any player. Effect (Endgame) = +3 VP for each Factory connected to a Space Elevator.

column24: Can't enter aerobrakes.
-2 to Colocated size rolls on Synodic Comets. Can't enter aerobrakes.
column25: NEW VENUS FUTURE: Req = Decommission operational 7+ net thrust thruster on industrialized Synodic Comet (yours). 12 VP + (Endgame) remove all tokens on Venus & comet.

column24: Boost costs are doubled for all your opponents.

column24: Performs epic hazard operation as a free action, & is not Decommissioned if it fails.

column24: -1 to Colocated size rolls.

column24: -1 on all size rolls when prospecting Synodic Sites.

column24: Can produce ET products of Spectral Type C at any Factory.
